name: Cinnamon Apple and Havarti Tea Sandwiches
author: CookieEater
summary: These tasty tea sandwiches are simple but unique and perfect for entertaining. The combination of the tart apples, creamy cheese, and sweet cinnamon raisin bread is surprisingly delicious.
ingredients: 1 large Granny Smith apple, cored and thinly sliced
directions: Spread a thin layer of cream cheese on 4 slices of bread
Top the cream cheese with a slice of Havarti cheese, then a thin layer of apple slices
Place the remaining slices of bread on top to form 4 sandwiches
Using 2 diagonal cuts, divide each sandwich into 4 triangles
